item.title: Arch Wiki
item.description: The ArchWiki is very helpful for every linux user. It has almost all the solution to problem a first time linux user can have.

item.title: Dual boot linux distro and Windows
item.description: This post in Manjaro forum is a good guide to dual boot

item.title: My Setup
item.description: Hardware I am using a Lenovo laptop (Ideapad 110-15AST). It comes with AMD A9 9400, 8 GB of RAM, a 1 TB hard disk. Its an old laptop but it gets the work done. I have an Asus M1 Pro which I just bought mainly for its 5000 mAh Li-Po battery. Software I use both linux and Windows OS. I use Manjaro Linux (bspwm). I have tried many distros but I like Manjaro Linux the most.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi I am 1nt3rrupt. I am currently an undergrad studying Computer Science. This site was created because I wanted to know about static site generator like hugo. My primary interests comprises of anything computer related, recently I have been trying to learn things about computer security. I am also using this website to keep note of anything i find useful on the internet. Nothing much to write here. This website This website is created using static site generator hugo.
